content: MT-C-LL1 Angle connector Right-angle connector for assembling strut channel structures ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Easy to install – compatible with the Hilti MT Twist-Lock, a faster alternative to spring nuts for assembling a modular support system Adaptable – unlike welding, angle brackets allow you to modify strut channel framing during installation and for future MEP requirements Extensive software support – PROFIS Modular Support Engineering, the MEP Support Selector, Revit® families, and plug-ins for Staad Pro® and Smart 3D® are all available to streamline design and ordering Applications Fastening L-shaped connections between any MT strut channels Assembling 2D metal framing for MEP support structures, such as strut trapeze Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q235 or better steel Surface finish: Electro galvanized - for dry indoor use only Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q235 or better steel | Surface finish | Electro galvanized - for dry indoor use only | Material thickness | 4 mm | Weight | 0.7 lb | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2272047 - Angle connector MT-C-LL1 - Package Size 10 pc
